name: TVColor
desc: The color data used by styles.

items.name: var color: UIColor?
items.desc: A UIColor object used to color an element.

items.name: var colorType: TVColorType
items.desc: The color type for an element.

items.name: enum TVColorType
items.desc: Designates how color for an element is to be displayed.

items.name: var gradientColors: [UIColor]?
items.desc: An array of colors used to create a gradient for an element.

items.name: var gradientPoints: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An array of points used to determine gradient color changes.
